name: Refrigerator LG GBB62SEHMN Sand Beige
origAbout: Cool evenly and quickly with LG DoorCooling+™ technology. DoorCooling+™ - faster & even cooling everywhere. The air vents located at the front of the fridge helps maintain temperature to keep your food items fresh.Maximise freshness and reduce energy cost with Linear Cooling™ technology. Delight Your Senses with NatureFRESH™ for a joyful eating experience. Enjoy fresh food and produce. LINEARCooling™ - keep food fresher for longer. The LG Inverter Linear Compressor helps maintain the appearance and taste of fresh products for longer by reducing temperature fluctuations.
